content:
Uniform Resource Names: Deploying A New Namespace
Michael Mealling, Network Solutions

Abstract:

Uniform Resource Names (RFC2141) provide a namespace that is persistent in that the binding between the name and th resource is permanent. The specifications for assignment and resolution are in the process of being published and the standards work is coming to a close. The next step is the actual deployment of the namespace in order to solve specific problems. This presentation will discuss the following important phases of that deployment: problem identification, experimentation, development, adoption, scaling and management.

TWIST 99

Irvine Research Unit in Software
Information and Computer Science
University of California, Irvine
Irvine, CA 92697-3425
